name: Lentils With Ginger and Lemon Flavor
keywords: ginger, lentils, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, main course, side dish
recipeIngredient: Juice of 1/2 lemon plus the skin and pulp

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a saucepan and add the onions, garlic and bay leaf. Cook, stirring, until the onions are lightly browned.

Add the lentils, water, cinnamon, Tabasco, lemon juice, skin and pulp, ginger and salt. Bring to a boil and simmer for about 10 to 15 minutes until tender and most of the moisture is removed. Do not overcook. Remove the bay leaf and sprinkle with coriander. Serve hot.
